channel.title: Runescape Classic Server help
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm new to all this, I just wanted to know, how do you actually make a server? I mean I want to be able to make a classic server so people can enjoy it as well as I do, because all of us know that the real Runescape is going to shit... So yeah, I would really appreciate it if someone could give me some starter tips. Thanks guys. :)
-Adam

item.title: Runescape Classic Server help
item.dc:creator: @Artemis_Wp Artemis Wp
item.description:
@Artemis_Wp wrote:

[quote=“Wife Beater, post:4, topic:455145”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=558022.msg4082291#msg4082291 date=1345481720]

Going to shit? It was shit since RS2 came out…[/quote]

True statement, anyway, moparclassic is a great source but you will get lost if you dont have a good deception of java. If you want to start with a very easy to manage source, use Easyrsc.[/quote]

Ill recomand NOOBScape v3 cuz its more developed. Anyway if youre gonna use NOOBScape or EasyRSC and u get lost, i can help u in my free time. Currently a bit busy working on my server

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Server help
item.dc:creator: @Wife_Beater Wife Beater
item.description:
@Wife_Beater wrote:

CodeForFame:

Going to shit? It was shit since RS2 came out…

True statement, anyway, moparclassic is a great source but you will get lost if you dont have a good deception of java. If you want to start with a very easy to manage source, use Easyrsc.

Read full topic
